name: Forest Escape (itch) (Akshansh)
description:
You play as a journalist who came to investigate the forest after hearing reports of strange sightings there. You find yourself stuck in forest and must escape to warn others about what's here! 

NOTE: the game contains slight blood effects

You can craft items and use motion tracker to plan and escape successfully! There are notes across the game to help you understand what happened your main objective is surviving and escaping.

All the asset and game is made from scratch within 2month period .

If you have any suggestions please leave a comment and tell me what you like or dislike sbout the game.
